      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int API_VERBOSE_LEVEL

        When set to true, API will output all downloaded and uploaded content.

      • BASE_URL

        public static final String BASE_URL
        The webserver to which request are done. ends with tailing slash. (Api suffix will be added by ApiConnector)
